title: Leaders Talk About Peace Plans for Ukraine
summary: Leaders from many countries met in Kyiv, Ukraine, to talk about how to help Ukraine end the war with Russia. They want to make peace and give Ukraine support to stay safe and strong. President Zelenskyy of Ukraine said they are working on plans for security guarantees, which are promises from other countries to protect Ukraine. They also discussed giving Ukraine money to rebuild after the war, about $800 billion over ten years. This money will help fix buildings, make the economy stable, and help Ukraine grow. The leaders will have more meetings in Paris to finalize these plans. Ukraine is also changing some government jobs, like appointing a new energy minister.

keywords.explanation: a time when there is no war and people live in safety
promises from other countries to help protect a country from attacks
to fix or build again things that were damaged, like houses or roads
how a country makes and uses money, goods, and services
gatherings where people talk and make decisions together

questions.question: Where did the leaders meet to discuss peace plans?
How much money might Ukraine get for support over ten years?
What will the money help Ukraine do?
Who is the president of Ukraine mentioned in the summary?
Where will more meetings happen to finalize plans?

background_read: Ukraine is a country in Europe that has been at war with Russia for almost four years. Many other countries want to help Ukraine find peace and recover from the damage caused by the war. Leaders from places like Europe, Canada, and Japan are working together to support Ukraine with safety promises and money.
Article_Structure: WHO: Leaders from Europe and other countries, including President Zelenskyy of Ukraine
WHAT: They discussed peace plans, security guarantees, and economic support for Ukraine
WHERE: The meeting was in Kyiv, Ukraine, with more meetings planned in Paris
WHY: To help end the war with Russia and support Ukraine's safety and recovery

perspectives.description: Many countries are working together to help Ukraine achieve peace and rebuild after the war.
